title: Incorrect Functionality Regarding Custom Cookie Name and URL Rewriting in Servlet 3.0 Ch.7.1.1
description: The documentation in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 suggests that a custom cookie name should impact URL rewriting.
OB: The Reload link is not following the expected URL format based on the custom cookie name; it's displaying an incorrect URL.
EB: Expected behavior: Following the guidance in ch.7.1.1, the Reload link should display http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Set a custom cookie name in the servlet context.
2. Access the application and generate a session.
3. Navigate to the Reload link and observe the URL generated.
